amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit funds in the bill under the heading "OFFICE OF JUSTICE PROGRAMS-JUSTICE ASSISTANCE" from being used by a State Authorizing Agent that has not shared, with the Attorney General, its improvement of criminal justice records as described in Section 3759 of Title 42, United States Code.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A044) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 244 (Roll no. 264).
